summary.value: Create a firearm that deals air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, or physical.

system.description:
Required: Advanced Benefits in @UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-core-rulebook.skills.Item.EmwWSYlFjlUSGPLL]{Gadget- Magitech}

For @LOSS[3 ip] creates a firearm that deals air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, OR physical damage. Drag and drop the one you create onto your character sheet.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-core-rulebook.consumables.Item.EGvZsEWEhaTqoCgG]{Magicannon (Air @ICON[air])}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-core-rulebook.consumables.Item.uuKKqm81klCOiDjO]{Magicannon (Bolt @ICON[bolt])}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-core-rulebook.consumables.Item.sREYRTy6TfK8fe53]{Magicannon (Earth @ICON[earth])}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-core-rulebook.consumables.Item.jHbcjw8RW9Ywesyu]{Magicannon (Fire @ICON[fire])}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-core-rulebook.consumables.Item.eVOnHgRLTnL695cP]{Magicannon (Ice @ICON[ice])}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-core-rulebook.consumables.Item.MJoIwfTvo0FHcDqL]{Magicannon (Physical @ICON[physical])}
